recipes.label: Increase my understanding of the Wolf's techniques?
recipes.startdescription: I have taken my mortal understanding of the Wolf's arts to its utmost. Even so, perhaps I might find something useful in this.
recipes.description: My eyes water. My teeth grind. The world bleeds light.

recipes.label: Increase my understanding of the Wolf's techniques
recipes.startdescription: Some lessons can only be learnt through the annihilation of those who oppose us. Thus, even unmade, our enemies may do us service.
recipes.description: My breath escapes from me stinking like blood and tar. My limbs burn with an intimate pain. I am a conduit for agony, and now I understand better how it may pass from me to my enemy.
